instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115-B shows 100% all the time
threads.message: Are all details about the battery displayed? Cycle count, full charge capacity, etc?

threads.title: 820-3115-B shows 100% all the time
threads.message: ok on external system it shows actual precent and displays all details though charging NO and no orange led.

threads.title: 820-3115-B shows 100% all the time
threads.message: Sense resistors or traces R7021/22/51/52, the usual. Check that PPBUS is 12.56V and not 12.23V too without battery connected.
